Concord.Concord High School (North Carolina): Concord (/ˈkɒn.kɔɹd/ or /ˈkaŋ.kəɹd/) is a city in Cabarrus County, in the U.S. state of North Carolina. As of the 2010 census, the city had a population of 79,066, with an estimated population in 2016 of over 89,891. It is the county seat and the largest city in Cabarrus County.
